title: 4-bit Shift Register with Set, Reset, and Clock Functionality
description: GRAY_TO_BYTE converts a Gray-coded value (IN) in a byte.
name: SHR_4E

input.name: SET
input.description: Input signal to set the shift register.

input.name: D0
input.description: Data input for the shift register.

input.name: CLK
input.description: Clock input signal to trigger the shifting operation.

input.name: RST
input.description: Reset signal to reset the shift register outputs.

output.name: Q0
output.description: Output representing the least significant bit of the shift register.

output.name: Q1
output.description: Output representing the second least significant bit of the shift register.

output.name: Q2
output.description: Output representing the second most significant bit of the shift register.

output.name: Q3
output.description: Output representing the most significant bit of the shift register.
